title: Episode 70: Listener Mailbag
description:
On today’s Old Man and the Three, JJ and Tommy answer YOUR questions! Tommy has some hot takes and JJ is on an epic Golf kick but they take some time to answer questions submitted by the listeners. From what's their favorite movie villains are, to what shot in JJ's career would he take back the most -The questions run the gamut. We find out if JJ is a lawn game kindof guy, what appetizer Tommy likes the most, and they even talk about who the best player in the NBA is right now! None of the answers are what you expect!
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
